extendedInfo.description: 17 treatment algorithms based on information from the 2010 American Heart Association Guidelines for Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation and Emergency Cardiovascular Care Science.These algorithms have been carefully built from scratch for optimal display on phones and tablets while still accurately reflecting proper patient care procedures as defined by the AHA.Treatment Algorithms: -Adult Cardiac Arrest -Adult Cardiac Arrrest (Circular) -Acute Coronary Syndromes -Adult BLS Healthcare Provider -Simplified Adult BLS -Adult Bradycardia -Adult Tachycardia -Adult Immediate Post-Cardiac Arrest -Adult Suspected Stroke -ALS Termination of Resuscitation Rule for Adult OHCA -BLS Termination of Resuscitation Rule for Adult OHCA -Maternal Cardiac Arrest -Newborn Resuscitation -Pediatric BLS Healthcare Providers -Pediatric Cardiac Arrest -Pediatric Bradycardia -Pediatric Tachycardia* The AHA is not affiliated in any way with Draken Design and has not endorsed this application.
